00031 #include <vector>
00032 #include <iostream>
00033 
00034 class ConfigLoader
00035 {
00036 private:
00037     std::ifstream cfg;
00038 
00039 public:
00040     ConfigLoader( const std::string &filePath );
00041     ~ConfigLoader();
00042 
00043     class Option    //use for adminlist as well
00044     {
00045     public:
00046         std::string name;
00047         std::string value;
00048     };
00049 
00050     class Banlist
00051     {
00052     public:
00053         std::string nick, ip, date, time, motive, author;
00054         std::vector< std::string > guids;
00055     };
00056 
00057     std::vector< ConfigLoader::Option > getOptions();
00058     std::vector< ConfigLoader::Banlist > getBanlist();
